modName: Main Theme Replaced With Epic War Drums
summary: Main theme replaced with a powerful war drum instrumental music.
descriptionHtml:
[center][size=4][/size][/center][center][size=4]DESCRIPTION[/size]

Are you tired of hearing same ol' chants on the menu that used to hype you
to slay dragons? Do you want to bring back that same feeling and enhance
your experience?  Look no more, because you have found it! Install this
mod and enjoy the ride!

[img]https://s15.postimg.cc/sc80bpvx7/meme.png[/img]﻿

[size=4]PREVIEW

[youtube]rXwdkPvo5uA[/youtube]

INSTALLATION[/size]

You should be able to use NMM for this mod, if not, manual download the
file, extract it into a different folder and drag & drop the content
in your Skyrim directory location.

[size=4]COMPATIBILITY[/size]

This mod only changes main theme soundtrack. It will not conflict with anything.
[/center]
author: LA

files.name: Main Theme Replaced With Epic War Drums
